item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @statsflamescape statsflamescape
item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

These are the codes for my quest, talking to the npc. For some reason when i get to case 17 the npc stops talking and nothing happens, even though i talk to him again after that he says the same thing. Could any one help me out?

     case 15:
			talk("HELP! I GOT ATTACKED BY A FIERCE MONSTER!", 3555);
			sendQuest("@yel@Ultimate Challenge", 7332);
			q1 = 1;
			break;
		case 16:
			talk("Looking for a rare blade, I came across this BEAST.", 3555);
			break;
		case 17:
			talk("Now i cannot even obtain the SLENDER BLADE, UNLESS...", 3555);
			break;
		case 18:
			choice("Fine, I can help", "NO WAY...");
			q1 = 2;
			break;
		case 19:
			talk("Talk to me again when you are Prepared", 3555);
			break;
		case 20:
			talk("GOOD LUCK! and dont forget the SLENDER BLADE!", 3555);
			toX = 2368;
			toY = 4954;
			q1 = 3;
			break;
		case 21:
			talk("OMFG! THE SLENDER BLADE!", 553);
			break;
		case 22:
			talk("wow i love you man, heres your reward", 553);
			sendQuest("@gre@Ultimate Challenge", 7332);
			deleteItem(6817, 1);
			addItem(13638, 1);
			q1 = 15;
